about_me.des: I am a Java engineer with Web development skills. Life is a continuous learning process, so work makes me more rigorous, travel makes my life more colorful. I have amazing experiences when coding and traveling.

projects.saplatform: Saplatform is a automated service for operations, it has asset management, project release, database access function, it can control mass servers.
projects.jalpc: Jalpc is a simple, beautiful and swift theme for Jekyll. It has comprehensive function, it can be easily used and edited. It's adapted for many kinds devices.
projects.angularjs: It is a web font application written by Angularjs and deployed by Jekyll on github (gh-pages), the backend platform is Leancloud, you can use Parse as well.
projects.rsser: Rsser is an Ionic application, with this application we can read news and articles freely, you can add rss address from the given list and add it manually.

career.eldorado_des: CORRIGIR - Now I am in Nextcode and develop website with Python code for genetic analysis.
career.stefanini_des: CORRIGIR -In Netease game, I learned game service system and use Python code for ops.
career.politec_des: CORRIGIR -In ucloud, I started to deal with servers and Linux system and use shell scripts to manage massive server.
career.castmeta_des: CORRIGIR -In ucloud, I started to deal with servers and Linux system and use shell scripts to manage massive server.
career.college_des: CORRIGIR -At July 2013,I graduated from college and started my IT technology tour.
